name: Slinger (CrystalEllipsis, Walcz)
description:
Submission for the Mini Jam 55.

Agent Meowschief (Codename: ShadowTiger) is out on a mission. With his trusty yarn line he marches on bravely through enemy lines. Leaving no traces of his infiltration - he WILL break that vase!

CONTROLS:
A & D - Movement Left/Right
Spacebar - Jump
Left Mouse Click - Throw yarn rope
Right Mouse Click - Bring back rope
W & S - Move Up/Down the rope
R - Restart Stage

Notes:
Break the vase at the end of the level by pushing it off the ledge.
If any issues jumping occur - try hooking the rope then jumping again.
If any unforeseen issues /glitches occur restart the level by pressing 'R'

Made with Weronika Walczak (As co-designer and artist) https://walcz.itch.io/

External Resources Used (Music & SFX):
SketchyLogic – NES Shooter Music
(https://opengameart.org/content/nes-shooter-music-5-tracks-3-jingles)
Jason Dagenet – Realization
(https://opengameart.org/content/realization)
Dklon – Platformer Jumping Sounds
(https://opengameart.org/content/platformer-jumping-sounds)
Spookymodem – Breaking Bottle
(https://opengameart.org/content/breaking-bottle)
